content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Factory at position(-5, -65)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position(-5.0, -65.0) connected to iron ore and producing iron plates.
- Burner mining drill at position(47.0, -82.0) extracting iron ore.
- Multiple wooden chests for storage at positions (46.5, -83.5), (48.5, -83.5), (5.5, -79.5), and (10.5, -79.5).

### Electricity Generator at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position(0.5, 0.5) which is not connected to a power network.
- Boiler at position(0.5, 6.0) which is not receiving any input liquid.

### Pipe System
Consists of multiple pipe groups at various positions, facilitating fluid transport but currently empty.

### Transport Belt System
Consists of a belt group at position(40.5, -84.5) connecting inputs and outputs for item transport.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting Boiler and Steam Engine
- Not enough pipes to connect Boiler and Steam Engine. Ensure you have sufficient pipes in your inventory before attempting to connect these entities.

### Errors when placing Offshore Pump
- Cannot place Offshore Pump as it is not in inventory. Make sure to have the Offshore Pump in your inventory before attempting to place it.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Ensure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
